news.title: If your friends have problems when installing Kaku
news.content: Please tell them to unzip files into C:\Kaku or D:\Kaku to avoid hitting MAX_PATH_LENGTH problem in Windows. After testing, this should fix the problem about installing Kaku.
news.label: warning

news.title: Kaku 1.5.0 was released !
news.content:
Release Notes :
  • Rewrite the whole application with webpack
  • Fixed snapshot problem for Vimeo Tracks
  • Added world-wide Top tracking !
  • Translate App menu items to all different languages
  • Added Russian translation
  • Added Portuguese translation
  • Added tooltip for tracks
  • Added Best Audio option in Settings page to reduce your bandwidth
  • Added Always on Top option in Settings page
  • Increased search results to 50 items
  • Fixed unknown artist problem
  • Fixed MAX_LENGTH problem in Windows
news.label: info

news.title: Kaku 1.1.0 was released !
news.content:
Release Notes :
  • Add SoundCloud Searcher
  • Add backup / sync feature (Local + Dropbox)
  • Add Japanese translation
  • Add Download Manager
  • Polish UI / fixed lots of small bugs
  • Please use Cmd / Ctrl+D to download tracks instead.
news.label: info

news.title: Kaku 1.0.0 was released !
news.content: We just released 1.0.0 version for Kaku ! In this version, you can listen to YouTube, Vimeo tracks and add playlists. In addition to this, we do support English, Français and 繁體中文.
news.label: info
